channel.title: Query Permissions
channel.description:
My team is growing and finding it fairly time-consuming to give edit access to our queries 1 by 1 to each teammate. (screenshot attached) ![Screen Shot 2022-03-03 at 2.14.36 PM|528x188](upload://uYW3DRnA7bFTT47lWlIhoIFwPVC.png)
Is there an easier way to add 10 or so users at once to have permissions to edit a query?

item.title: Query Permissions
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Short term: you can use the API for this but unfortunately we don’t have a published recipe for it.

Longer term: we’re hoping to completely overhaul the permissions model that will make this easier to do with group base permissions.

Read full topic
